    • isUnder22

      public boolean isUnder22(int score)
      The isUnder22 method checks if the score in the argument is under 22.
      Parameters:
      score - The score of the user or npc.
      Returns:
      True if the score is under 22, false if above 21.

    • isWinner

      public boolean isWinner(int score1, int score2)
      The isWinner method compares the scores to decide if the user is a winner of the round.
      Parameters:
      score1 - The player to compares score.
      score2 - The opposing player's score.
      Returns:
      True if player is winner, return false if not a winner.
